page.title: 12Recreation in Godstone.
page.content: If I get bored at home, I ask my mum if she will take me swimming. If not, I am allowed to play with a friend. We go on our bikes or put on our wellies and play by the river. There is a tunnel which we go through which has cars driving over above us. On the other side you are in Godstone Farm where you can see the goats and the playground. Down by the river there is a bridge where we play, "Pooh-Sticks." We drop the sticks over one side of the bridge and see whose stick comes out first.
